title: Convert BYTE to Range
description:
BYTE_TO_RANGE convert a BYTE value to a REAL. An input value of 0 cor￾responds to the REAL value of LOW and an input value of 255 corresponds
to the input value of HIGH.
To convert a BYTE value of 0 .255 to a percent of 0 .100 the module is cal￾led, as follows:
BYTE_TO_RANGE (X,0,100)
name: BYTE_TO_RANGE

input.name: X
input.description: The BYTE value to be converted, which should be in the range of 0 to 255.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower boundary of the desired range.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper boundary of the desired range.

return_value.description: The scaled value in the range defined by low and high based on the input BYTE value.
